@description.name: @description
@description.body:
The SelectBox an example, how to use the SelectBox: Example 

    var page1 = new qx.ui.mobile.page.Page();
    page1.addListener("initialize", function()
    {
      var sel = new qx.ui.mobile.form.SelectBox();
      page1.add(sel);
      var model = new qx.data.Array(["item1","item2"]);
      sel.setModel(model);
      model.push("item3");
      var but = new qx.ui.mobile.form.Button("setSelection");
      page1.add(but);
      but.addListener("tap", function(){
        sel.setSelection("item3");
      }, this);
      sel.addListener("changeSelection", function(evt) {
        console.log(evt.getData());
      }, this);
      var title = new qx.ui.mobile.form.Title("item2");
      title.bind("value",sel,"value");
      sel.bind("value",title,"value");
      page1.add(title);
   },this);
   page1.show();

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when user selects an item.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when the enabled state was modified

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when the valid state was modified

@description.body: Fired when the invalidMessage was modified

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when the required was modified

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when the model value was modified

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when the model data changes

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The event is fired on every keystroke modifying the value of the field. The method {@link qx.event.type.Data#getData} returns the current value of the text field.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Defines if the SelectBox has a clearButton, which resets the selection.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The model to use to render the list.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The selected index of this SelectBox.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the {@link #changeValue} event should be fired on every key input. If set to true, the changeValue event is equal to the {@link #input} event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Flag signaling if a widget is valid. If a widget is invalid, an invalid state will be set.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Flag signaling if a widget is required.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Message which will be shown in an tooltip if the widget is invalid.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Message which will be shown in an invalid tooltip if the {@link #required} is set to true.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Maximal number of characters that can be entered in the input field.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: String value which will be shown as a hint if the field is all of: unset, unfocused and enabled. Set to null to not show a placeholder text.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the field is read only

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Creates the menu dialog. Override this to customize the widget.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {qx.ui.mobile.dialog.Menu} A dialog, containing a selection list.
@return.description: A dialog, containing a selection list.

@description.name: @description

@description.body: Get the text value of this It is called by setValue method of qx.ui.mobile.form.MValue mixin.

@return.name: @return

@return.description: the new selected index of the SelectBox.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the field model value. Should also update the UI.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {var|null} Updates the field with the new model value.
@param.description: Updates the field with the new model value.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{null|Error} Should return an error when the type of
  model value is not compatible with the implementing class (the concrete field).
@return.description:
Should return an error when the type of
  model value is not compatible with the implementing class (the concrete field).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the model value to its initial value. Should also update the UI.

@return.description: The model value plain or as promise.

@description.body: Resets the user value of the property model. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #model}.
